page.title: 06A Local Person.
page.content:
I interviewed one of the local inhabitants of Tupsley. The lady told me that she had lived there for 10 years.
She said that it is very quiet where she lives and that she is happy there and would not like to move.
I asked if she was satisfied with the local amenities available and she said that there were plenty. She makes use of a lot of the facilities. She uses the shops in Tupsley quite a lot, but would like there to be a chemist in the area to save travelling to Hereford.
There are 4 schools around where she lives on a small estate.
